A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I'll be in the minority here\, 'cause many fans hated TLJ. I liked it way better than TFA. It had actual lessons to be learned from the story\, and Ren\, who I thought was lame in the first movie\, more than made up for it here. Sure\, this movie has some weak points\, but I liked that they at least took chances here.
